name: year-zero-fantasy
description: Simple fantasy hack of the Year Zero Engine
author: Ric Wood <ric@grislyeye.com>

scripts.build:dist: mkdir -p dist && node index.js > dist/index.html && npm run build:assets && npm run build:modules
scripts.build:modules: mkdir -p dist/vendor && cp -r node_modules/vellum-doc dist/vendor/vellum-doc/ && cp -r node_modules/magick.css/ dist/vendor/magick.css/
scripts.lint: npx prettier . --check && npx stylelint 'assets/styles/**/*.css' && htmlhint dist/**/*.html
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:server
